subject: Drag Racing
Automobile Racing
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Al Unser Jr. was arrested on charges of drunken driving and reckless driving in New Mexico after driving more than 100 miles an hour, officials at the Bernalillo County Sheriff’s Department said.
snippet: The two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Al Unser Jr. was arrested on charges of drunken driving and reckless driving in New Mexico after driving more than 100 miles an hour, officials at the Bernalillo County Sheriff’s Department said.
